short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for managing Chrome browser windows and tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you always have multiple Chrome windows open? Do you find yourself bouncing from one tab to another? How much time do you waste looking for open tabs in Chrome? 

Chrome Helper gives you control of all your open Chrome windows in a simple, easy to use window. 

- Activate any open tab with a click
- Close any open tab or window of tabs
- Move tabs from one window to another
- Filter tabs by document type
- Save windows of tabs by name to open later (Contexts)
- Open saved contexts
- Plus, addition Search and History features
